title: 3-year-old among shooting victims in Central Bakersfield
content:
Three people, including a 3-year-old and an 18-year-old, are recovering after a shooting in Central Bakersfield late Tuesday night.
According to Bakersfield Police, three people were shot just before 11 p.m. Tuesday in the 300 block of Donna Avenue near 4th Street.
Police say one victim was at the scene and was transported to a hospital to be treated for minor injuries. Two other victims, a 3-year-old and an 18-year-old, were not at the scene when police arrived, but had already been taken to a hospital for treatment of minor injuries.
No arrests have been made.
